entry.notes: Imported from Times Microwave Systems catalog

source_text:
Times Microwave Systems LMR-400
Model: LMR-400
Type: cable
0.405" diameter flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
Impedance: 50 ohms
Velocity: 85.0%
Attenuation at 50 MHz: 0.4 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 150 MHz: 0.7 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 220 MHz: 0.9 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 450 MHz: 1.3 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 900 MHz: 1.9 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1800 MHz: 2.8 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1900 MHz: 2.9 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 2400 MHz: 3.3 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 5800 MHz: 5.8 dB/100ft

expected_json.description: 0.405" diameter flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
expected_json.notes: Most popular LMR cable, good balance of loss, flexibility, and power handling
